name: IconButton
description: IconButton component for icon-only buttons. Extends MUI IconButton with custom styling.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the button will be disabled

props.name: edge
props.description: If true, the button will use edge padding

examples.title: Basic

migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI IconButton with design system IconButton. Always provide aria-label for accessibility.

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: Enter or Space activates the button
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Always provide aria-label since there is no visible text

whenNotToUse: For actions with text labels (use Button instead)
bestPractices: Use Tooltip to provide context on hover
Use edge prop for alignment in toolbars
